name: Gulch Defense
description:
Gulch Defense is Zombie wave defense game inspired by last stand.

36 days of wave

5 types of enemy

4 types of weapon

2 types of heavy weapon

and more..

Game Tips.

1.Player have maximum angle to fire so keep moving!

2.Special place have special reward!

3.Resource is not unlimited save few for stronger weapon and equipment!

Controls

ESC - Pause menu

1,2,3,4 - Weapon Selection

Q,E - Heavy weapon

WASD - Movement control

ZXCV - Control allies

R - Reloading

Left click - Fire

Right click - Cancel heavy weapon fire
